org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.session

类 PollingSockJsSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.session.AbstractSockJsSession
      • org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.session.AbstractHttpSockJsSession
        • org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.session.PollingSockJsSession
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, SockJsSession, WebSocketSession

    public class PollingSockJsSession
extends AbstractHttpSockJsSession
    A SockJS session for use with polling HTTP transports.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

      • handleRequestInternal

        protected void handleRequestInternal(ServerHttpRequest request,
                                     ServerHttpResponse response,
                                     boolean initialRequest)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: AbstractHttpSockJsSession
        Invoked when a SockJS transport request is received.
        指定者:
        handleRequestInternal 在类中 AbstractHttpSockJsSession
        参数:
        request - the current request
        response - the current response
        initialRequest - whether it is the first request for the session
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • flushCache

        protected void flushCache()
                   throws SockJsTransportFailureException
        从类复制的说明: AbstractHttpSockJsSession
        Called when the connection is active and ready to write to the response. Subclasses should only call this method from a method where the "responseLock" is acquired.
        指定者:
        flushCache 在类中 AbstractHttpSockJsSession
        抛出:
        SockJsTransportFailureException

      • writeFrame

        protected void writeFrame(SockJsFrame frame)

        从类复制的说明: AbstractSockJsSession
        For internal use within a TransportHandler and the (TransportHandler-specific) session class.
        覆盖:

        抛出:
